name: Sakura Blaster
description:
Sakura Blaster is a high-octane side-scrolling shooter with anime-inspired graphics and a pumping soundtrack. Play through the story to help recently graduated witch Allison save the land from monsters and pollution, or rack up a high score in the infinite mode as her partner Bethany. Includes unlockable art panels!

Previously shown at Sunnycon 2019, Sakura Blaster is Silvergunner Games’ first ever game, created in 11 months by a single developer.

Sakura Blaster is built in MonoGame and works on virtually any Windows computer running Windows 7 upwards.

The game by itself is free to download and play. However if you add a tip, you will be helping the developer create more games in the future.

Game (c)2019 Silvergunner Games.
